page.title: 20THE CREMATORIUM AND CREDITS.
page.content:
The{Crematorium}is situated on the very edge of the city, in{Barton.}It is a beautifully set out building with its chapel providing a fitting setting for a final farewell for a bereaved family. There is a{Garden of {Remembrance}which has been planted with{roses}given by people who visit.
{************************************** CREDITS: -------- Many children from all four years in Headington Middle School, Oxford compiled the information for the disk.
{Michael}J{Clarke, Mark}E{Darley,} {John}C{Williams}and{Robert}C{Bowman,}
edited and entered some of the text during the +***{SCHOOL HOLIDAYS}***+ {**************************************
